Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahh, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I thought you might be stopping by soon.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
However, it looks like you're a little too late. I've
heard that one can now buy horses at the Silk
Country stall in the Trade Depot.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You said you couldn't find a place that sells
horses here, so I thought I'd do you a favor and
use my connections to find one for you.
<PAGE>
But if you can waltz down to the Trade Depot
and simply purchase one, it seems you have
little need of my assistance.
<PAGE>
They seem a tad on the expensive side, but if
you'd like a horse, well, there they are.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That will be all for today, then. Ta-ta.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? Have you brought the milk, as I asked?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You haven't? Then why on earth did you come
here? I'm doing you a big favor, you know,
getting this horse.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh well. Next time, be certain you bring the 5
bottles of milk as I requested.
<PAGE>
I will be occupied for the rest of today, so come
back tomorrow or later. Understood?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well? Have you brought the milk, as I asked?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...this doesn't look like pristine-quality
product, but since you're doing this as a favor,
I'll accept it. I'll see to your horse.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Sam! Somebody send for Sam right away!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Yes, my lady. What may I do for you?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I need you to acquire a horse for my friend here
and see that it's delivered to the barn at
<MYFARM>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh! And see that you deliver the "Horse Care"
book too.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. Sam is quite capable; he'll handle it from
here. Now, why don't you give your new horse a
name?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MOJI0>...? Well, it's not the
name -I- would have chosen, but oh well. It's
your horse, not mine.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, all that's left is to go home and check in
your barn. You'll find your horse waiting for you
there.
<PAGE>
You should also take some time to read "Horse
Care." I think as a first-time horse owner, you'll
find it quite informative.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That will be all for today. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I insist you give your horse a proper name!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <MOJI0> the name you want?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, so you don't like it either. Well then, come
up with a good one.
<BLUE>Horse Care</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
